text:
On UnixWare 7.1.1 using JDK 1.2.2, I get the following error from any of the
1.5alpha nightly versions (I've tried them all): 

internal_build:
No public execute() in class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.ExtFilterSet

ANT 1.4.1 works.

The following is the verbose output:
ant -verbose -buildfile /usr/local/dev/build_package/config/root.xml

creator: dfeistamel@shoptalk.com
dfeistamel@shoptalk.com
text:
This turned out to be a local problem because of interface changes between 
1.4.1 and 1.5. This can be closed.
